entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PowerShell running as SSH subsystem child SIGABRTs in a linux container #65232
  • Remove `% 0` workaround in `Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompilerServices` #65230
  • Improve generated code by using for-loops when using exact quantifiers with backreferences in patterns. #65229
    7.0.0
  • Ad-hoc codesign on macOS #65228
  • MissingRuntimeArtifactException on ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed.Load #65218
  • Windows Update can seemingly corrupt .NET Desktop Runtime installations sometimes #65217
  • System.ServiceModel.Syndication RSS 2.0 pubdate field,, error parsing Timezone #65212
  • [mono][workloads] Support building net-6.0 wasm workload apps in a net-7.0 sdk #65211
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid running work items for test suites that are not supported on browser #65210
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] allow the debug proxy to startup on a fixed port #65209
    7.0.0
  • Revise how VN determines whether an HWI operation needs "the base type arg" #65207
    7.0.0
  • Loop cloning driven by type tests #65206
    7.0.0
  • Building CoreCLR tests fails #65205
  • baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #65201
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 1 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #65200
  • `SimpleRWLock::EnterRead` shows up high in CPU usage in some cases #65199
    7.0.0
  • GC.AllocateUninitializedArray has regressed on macOS #65198
  • System.Tests.Perf_Version.Parse2 has regressed on Unix #65193
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4.MultiplyByScalarOperatorBenchmark has regressed #65191
  • System.Collections.IterateForEach<String>.SortedSet has regressed #65190
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorConvert.Convert_double_long has regressed #65189
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions performance regressions #65187
  • Interlocked.CompareExchange on enums #65184
  • Failing test system.tests.gcextendedtests.getallocatedbytesforcurrentthread #65183
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\NaN\\r4NaNadd_cs_r\\r4NaNadd_cs_r.cmd #65182
  • LTTng support for Mono runtime #65181
  • Bug in System.IO Directory.GetDirectories and Directory.GetFiles methods when used with System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories #65180
  • [mono] Tests failing with error: Invalid IL code in (wrapper native-to-managed) System.Runtime.InteropServices.PosixSignalRegistration:HandlerRoutine (int): IL_0049: ret #65177
  • [linux][arm64] Assert failure: 'regNum >= 0 && regNum <= 30' at gcinfodecoder.cpp #65175
  • dotnet restore inconsistencies across platforms #65173
  • [tests] Runtime tests hitting System.MissingMethodException no stacktrace on Android #65171
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\ConstrainedCall\\vt1_il_d\\vt1_il_d.cmd #65170
  • System.Net.Security.Tests CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok failing on Windows 7 #65168

Closed

  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors test utils #60365
    Future
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #62650
    7.0.0
  • Math/MathF.Truncate isn't an intrinsic and results in inefficient codegen #56931
    7.0.0
  • GitHub_17777 test failing on linux-arm64 #64162
    7.0.0
  • CI failure in JIT/Methodical/cctor/misc/throw_cs_do/throw_cs_do.sh #65115
    7.0.0
  • Few performance regressions in Reflection APIs #65192
  • JIT: Incorrect result computed with forward sub #65104
    7.0.0
  • compile dotnet runtime source "Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj" error fail. #64528
  • Weird Optimization in for loop! #65194
  • Assembly.GetType("System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler", false, true) does not find type but finds it when ignoreCase is set to false #65013
    7.0.0
  • JIT: x*x*x*x -> (x*x)*(x*x) transformation #65141
  • atom10itemformattertests.writeto_emptyitem_serializesexpected fails in CI #57375
    7.0.0
  • DllImport from libc should support loading symbols from the global relocation table #65165

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Maui/Mobile pre.py's and disable android due to AOT Issue #65231
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable multiple tests failing in R2R-CG2 legs #65227
  • Convert over StandardOleMarshalObject to use either source-generated or manual interop. #65226
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-windows
  • Fix nullability in `IOptionsMonitor` #65225
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Remove JsonConverter.RuntimeType #65224
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Composite` #65223
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Use StartsWith in regex compiler / source gen for shorter strings #65222
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • Remove not needed lines #65220
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65219
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65216
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix race condition in InteropSyncBlock for ComWrappers map. #65215
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix race condition in InteropSyncBlock for ComWrappers map. #65214
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory` #65213
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options.ConfigurationExtensions` #65208
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Move Msquic over to Source-generated delegate interop. #65204
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Store the result in the return local in native-to-managed IL stubs. #65203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, runtime-mono
  • Send CA names on Linux #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable tests using external TLS1.2 server on win7 #65188
    area-System.Net
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65185
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [IGNORE] debugging some crashes #65178
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport code-fix to support stripping out PreserveSig and transforming the signature when PreserveSig was set to true #65169
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating wasm stack traces via XHarness #65167
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • [release/6.0][wasm] Remove USE_ZLIB=1 and include the sources instead #64907
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options.DataAnnotations` #65202
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use lite ciphers for CNG one shots #65151
    area-System.Security
  • Record callee saves in patchpoint info #65196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add check for Android NDK 23 to AndroidAppBuilder #65197
    area-Build-mono
  • Respect source generator projects in slngen #65124
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Increase arm32/arm64 maximum instruction group size #65153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.Math/MathF.Truncate an intrinsic #65014
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Move test with expected crash to outerloop #65114
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Introduce `GenTreeDebugOperKind` #64498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust naming #65179
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64914
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.3
  • Avoid using object_gennum for objects that could come from frozen segments #65174
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • JIT: fgMorphModToSubMulDiv should not reorder operands #65118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Credscan suppressions #65030
    area-Meta
  • Update StyleCopAnalyzers to 1.2.0-beta.406 #65142
    area-Meta
  • Avoid InitialTarget in libs tree for CoreLib #65146
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Subtract instead of building the cartesian product in targets #65123
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove GeneratedDllImportAttribute.PreserveSig #65164
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Second round of changing null checks to !! #65108
    area-Meta
  • Add a few more regex generator malformed input tests #65159
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix DacEnumerableHashTable enumerator #65157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Updated

  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Captures support for NonBacktracking #65129
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    community-contribution
  • For MultiRegStoreLoc prefer allocating a local def to the same register as src #64857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Clean the OpenSSL error queue more consistently #65148
    area-System.Security
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/monoapi #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • Add Maui performance scenarios to release6.0 runtime #65158
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][workload] Try to figure out how to support aot on net6.0 with a net7.0 sdk #61716
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • Move UnconditionalSuppressMessageAttributes from xml to .cs files for Syndication Library #65161
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Add a test for control flow guard #65122
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Keep information about CSE defs on assignment nodes #64896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fixes for CFG dispatcher on ARM64 #65127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for iOS runtime tests #64952
